channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Texas House approves redrawn maps sought by Trump ahead of 2026 elections
item.description: Texas’ House of Representatives is approving a new map that creates up to five new, winnable congressional seats for the GOP.

item.title: Hurricane Erin picking up steam as it edges along the East Coast
2 more beachfront homes near collapse as Hurricane Erin’s waves pound North Carolina’s Outer Banks
